pre_call_sms: Hi {first_name}, this is {rep_name} with Wolf Carports. I'm about to call you from {rep_phone}.
post_call_sms: Thank you for your time today, {first_name}. You can reach me at {rep_phone}. – {rep_name}, Wolf Carports
email_body:
Hi {first_name},

Thanks for speaking today. I'll share details shortly. You can reach me at {rep_phone}.

Best,
{rep_name}
Wolf Carports
